segments.text: OK , Allen . It's your turn . Are you ready ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really would rather just listen . Isn't there anyone else who wants to sing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on ! In the two hours we've been here you haven't sung even one song !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , but ... Hey , Stanley's here ! I've been wanting to hear him sing all night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you asked for it . Why don't you put on an Elvis song for him . He loves " The King . "
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll put the song at the front of the list .
segments.speaker: S2
